statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE location='New York'
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date='2022-01-05'
SELECT location, date FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY precipitation ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature > 80 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY location ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT location, date, humidity FROM weather_data ORDER BY humidity ASC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 70 AND 90 OR humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE recommended_duration < 30
SELECT date, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_forecasts WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, recommended_duration FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE irrigation_required = TRUE ORDER BY recommended_duration ASC
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecasts WHERE precipitation < 0.5
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_forecasts WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY humidity ASC, date DESC;
SELECT date, SUM(temperature) AS total_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_forecasts GROUP BY date HAVING total_temperature > 100 AND avg_humidity < 80 ORDER BY date;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts JOIN irrigation_schedules ON weather_forecasts.date = irrigation_schedules.date WHERE irrigation_required = TRUE ORDER BY temperature DESC, recommended_duration ASC;
SELECT date, adjustment_value FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-15' ORDER BY date ASC, adjustment_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts WHERE forecast_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecasts WHERE forecast_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, humidity FROM weather_forecasts WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY data_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecasts WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecasts JOIN historical_data ON forecast_date = data_date;
SELECT data_id, data_date, temperature, humidity, rainfall FROM historical_data WHERE temperature < 15 ORDER BY data_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM HistoricalData WHERE avg_temperature > 25;
SELECT date, irrigation_quantity FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE irrigation_duration < 30;
SELECT date, adjustment_reason FROM AdjustmentLog WHERE adjustment_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT date, avg_humidity FROM HistoricalData WHERE avg_humidity BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, avg_temperature, avg_humidity FROM HistoricalData WHERE avg_temperature < 20 AND avg_humidity > 70;
SELECT MAX(temperature), MIN(humidity) FROM WeatherForecast WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT date, SUM(irrigation_duration) AS total_duration FROM IrrigationSchedule GROUP BY date HAVING total_duration > 10;
SELECT date, adjustment_reason, adjustment_description FROM AdjustmentLog WHERE adjustment_reason LIKE '%fault%' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast;
SELECT id, forecast_date, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT field_name, area FROM Field ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT date, max_temperature, precipitation FROM HistoricalWeather ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationLog WHERE field_id = 3 ORDER BY irrigation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, area FROM Field WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND area > 10 ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT id, forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT id, date, max_temperature, precipitation FROM HistoricalWeather WHERE month(date) = 6 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT F.field_name, I.irrigation_date, I.duration FROM Field F JOIN IrrigationLog I ON F.id = I.field_id WHERE I.duration > 30 ORDER BY I.irrigation_date ASC;
